page_content:
PA Consulting Services Limited (UK)

Designing and Developing Cloud Architecture – Technical Delivery Partner

Cloud projects demand specialist architectural expertise to realise the benefits promised by the technology. PA’s enterprise and solution architects will draw on their diverse SaaS, PaaS and IaaS cloud expertise including Workday, Salesforce.com, Google Cloud and Amazon Web Services, to reduce IT costs and accelerate project delivery for your business.

Features

  • Solution architecture: defining and delivering cloud and hybrid solutions
  • Domain experts: providing business, application, information, data and infrastructure architects
  • Requirements definition: helping to identify and articulate business requirements
  • Delivery planning: ensuring timelines are achievable and meet your requirements
  • Solution building: integrating architecture, development and test for cloud solutions
  • Design authority: helping to specify, assure and integrate technical deliverables
  • Change management: helping to plan and control change within delivery
  • Strategic partnerships: strengthening capability through non-exclusive certification (AWS, Google)
  • Methodologies: delivering cloud solutions through agile or waterfall approaches
  • Standards-based: offering TOGAF-certified architects, tailoring our approach to your framework

Benefits

  • Proven approach: drawing on PA’s Driving and Releasing Change framework
  • Client-side service: working alongside you for successful cloud project delivery
  • Business alignment: integrating cloud solutions into your wider enterprise architecture
  • Insight: blending expertise and experience to deliver the optimum solution
  • Confidence: providing design authority services and robust monitoring and control
  • Collaboration: dovetailing with client and supplier architects, developers and testers
  • Flexibility: tailoring our delivery approach to fit with your methodology
  • Independence: delivering the right solutions through our vendor-neutral approach
  • Expertise: providing architecture professionals with hands-on cloud delivery experience
  • Experience: building on an awarding-winning cloud delivery portfolio across industries

Pricing

£650 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Other
